Articles.Content:
Any thoughts of developing a VR aspect? Being able to move the views and focus' with hand gestures (sort of like what is seen in "The Expanse") would be cool, and being able to get inside the skin of a Kerbal during EVA (maybe a HUD display on the helmet), and manipulate controls from within the cockpits/command modules would be extraordinary.   

Not sure how it'd work in the VAB/SPH - maybe like grabbing legos and slapping them together...? 

Edited March 9, 2021 by maddog59

If I remember right, there should be a mod out there that allows for this. I'm pretty sure I remember seeing  a video with it some years back.

As for vanilla VR support? I doubt that it is being considered for KSP 2 and definitely not for KSP1.
Before I posted I did a brief search and found a short demo video, showing climbing into the cockpit of an aircraft and flying around, but nothing beyond that.
